<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Chameleon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=724)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Giant chameleons are legendary for their ability to change their skin color in response to their surroundings. Their eyes are capable of peering in different directions independently, making them almost as difficult to sneak up on as they are to notice in the first place.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Giant Chameleon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=724)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 168 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +10; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Camouflage** The giant chameleon can change its coloration to match its surroundings. It doesn't need cover to attempt to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) with a [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) check.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 [all-around vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=1)

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 60

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +12 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d10+7 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tongue +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** tongue grab

**Tongue Grab**   If the giant chameleon hits a creature with a tongue Strike, that creature becomes [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) by the giant chameleon. The target isn't [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), but it can't move beyond the reach of the giant chameleon's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue with an attack that hits AC 15 and deals at least 4 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to the giant chameleon, it prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.

</column>
